casebody.data:
v. Jeral Thomas ORE, Jr. 352P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Ore, Jeral Thomas (Jr.) M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

STATE

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of September 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
